description: The Access Control Cluster exposes a data model view of a Node’s Access Control List (ACL), which codifies the rules used to manage and enforce Access Control for the Node’s endpoints and their associated cluster instances. Access to this Access Control Cluster itself requires a special Adminis­ ter privilege level, such that only Nodes granted such privilege (hereafter termed "Administrators") can manage the Access Control Cluster.

0x0000.name: ACL
0x0000.details: list[Access­ desc desc RW A F M
